references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image synthesis method using latent diffusion models, which is fundamental to the HiCo model's approach.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a hierarchical text-conditional image generation method using CLIP latents, which is a key component of the HiCo model's architecture and capabilities.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents GLIDE, a text-guided diffusion model capable of photorealistic image generation and editing, which is directly relevant to the HiCo model's goal of high-quality image synthesis.

This paper introduces GLIGEN, a model for open-set grounded text-to-image generation that addresses some of the limitations of existing methods, serving as a direct comparison for the HiCo model's performance.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces ControlNet, a method for adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models, which is a key technique used in HiCo's design for achieving more controllable layout generation.
